Hi Mike,

Interesting concept! I have toyed with the same ideas when we
dev=
eloped dynamic suites.  In rMock, please have a look at them, I
think that =
you  would find them interesting:
http://rmock.sourceforge.net/dynamicsuite=
s.html

Together with your custom TestSuite and a custom DynamicSuite actio=
n I
think the rule-based nature of DynamicSuites would complement your
idea=
s nicely.

We developed dynamic suites mainly to be able to dynamically gen=
erate
an allTests suite (that is much faster than finding all tests via ant=

or maven atleast when using the fork option).

I think that your ideas of =
finding classes to test would fit like a
glove in the dynamic suite concept=
. It would be interesting to get
your (and anyone elses) feedback on this.
=

Best regards!
Joakim Ohlrogge
